titleStmt.title: JRC-ACQUIS 31994D0315 English

94/315/CFSP: Council Decision of 30 May 1994 concerning the Common Position defined on the basis of Article J.2 of the Treaty on European Union regarding the reduction of economic relations with Haiti

notesStmt.note: Only European Community legislation printed in the paper edition of the Official Journal of the European Union is deemed authentic.

body.head: 94/315/CFSP: Council Decision of 30 May 1994 concerning the Common Position defined on the basis of Article J.2 of the Treaty on European Union regarding the reduction of economic relations with Haiti
body.p: COUNCIL DECISION of 30 May 1994 concerning the common position defined on the basis of Article J.2 of the Treaty on European Union regarding the reduction of economic relations with Haiti (94/315/CFSP)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION,
Having regard to the Treaty on European Union, and in particular Article J.2 thereof,
Having regard to resolution 917 (1994) adopted on 6 May 1994 by the United Nations Security Council,
1. Economic relations with Haiti shall be reduced in accordance with the relevant mandatory provisions of resolution 917 (1994) adopted on 6 May 1994 by the United Nations Security Council.
2. Member States shall adopt without delay the laws, regulations or administrative measures necessary to freeze the funds and financial resources referred to in pargraph 4 of that resolution.
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal.
